name: christmas2025-blesseddraw
description: This is a self-contained web application designed to facilitate real-time, non-repeating number draws for jackpot prizes. It runs entirely in your browser using local storage for persistence.

name: attendance-counter-app
description: A beautiful, mobile-first web application for tracking attendance across different age groups.

name: md-viewer
description: A simple, premium web application to view GitHub Markdown files by providing their URL in the query string.

name: dmarc-analyzer
description: A beautiful, privacy-focused web application for analyzing DMARC email authentication reports

name: pdf-splitter
description: SplitPDF is a modern, premium web application that allows users to upload a landscape PDF and split each page down the middle into two portrait pages. This is particularly useful for scanned books or documents where two pages are captured in a single landscape frame.

name: pdf-reorder
description: A premium, client-side web application to reorder pages of a PDF file.
